title: Three's a Crowd [1984] TVRIP
description:
Three's a Crowd 1984

This series continues where Three's Company ended. Jack Tripper met Vicky Bradford and fell in love with her at first sight. In the last episode of Three's Company he proposed marriage but due to her parents' divorce, she doesn't believe or want, but is willing to live with him. So, they move into the apartment above Jack's restaurant. Now Vicky's father who doesn't approve of Jack and even more doesn't approve of their living arrangement buys Jack's restaurant and thus becomes the new owner and is constantly dropping in to disrupt their relationship. Thus Three's a Crowd.

22 Episodes
TV RIP from previous torrent DVD

Someone else had previously ripped the DVD's to MP4 formatte but
that torrent is currently stalled. I therefore Ripped them again from 
the DVD's and here we are. I put a fairly high bit rate on the converter to try and keep the picture quality from degrading any more than it already is(the originals are recorded from TV's DejaView channel with commercials removed)

This is my second attempt at this torrent. The first one has the wrong name as the torrent file `files` This torrent file I hope is beter.
